parameterModifiers.label: in
parameterModifiers.documentation: Marks a parameter as a read-only borrow. Invalid outside parameter/receiver positions.

parameterModifiers.label: ref
parameterModifiers.documentation: Marks a parameter as a unique, mutable borrow. Invalid outside parameter/receiver positions.

parameterModifiers.label: out
parameterModifiers.documentation: Marks a parameter as a write-only borrow. The callee must assign a value before returning.
